description.narrative: Output 5.1 Programme Coordination, which contributes to Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 5. Program Effectiveness

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Programme Management meetings held in 2021 enabled review of programme workplans and Annual Management Plan (AMP), promoted learning and prioritization of critical priorities programmes to respond to COVID-19 epidemic, monitoring of progress of implementation of the key performance indicators. Assessment of implementation of priority programmes found that 61% of the priority programmes identified during the year were implemented and mainly affected by COVIiD-19 containment measures instituted by government.; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:08/01/2022
